subject: Football
Bowl Games
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The five conferences that do not receive automatic bids to the Bowl Championship Series will receive a record $24 million from this season’s B.C.S. bowl games, according to figures obtained by The Associated Press.
snippet: The five conferences that do not receive automatic bids to the Bowl Championship Series will receive a record $24 million from this season’s B.C.S. bowl games, according to figures obtained by The Associated Press.
